item.title: Monopoly GO: Date Night Thrills Rewards And Milestones
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Date Night Thrills Monopoly GO Rewards And Milestones
  • Date Night Thrills Monopoly GO Rewards Summary
  • How To Get Points In Date Night Thrills Monopoly GO

We've got a new solo event in Monopoly GO that fits right into the Valentine's theme this week. This time around, it's called Date Night Thrills. It started on Feb 14 and will be live for three days and five hours, ending on Feb 17 , the same day as Sweet Partners.

The Date Night Thrills event is packed with many rewards. You can grab over 3,000 Heart tokens for Sweet Partners, along with lots of stickers, dice, and cash. Below, we've put together a table with all the milestones and rewards for the Date Night Thrills Monopoly GO event.

Date Night Thrills Monopoly GO Rewards And Milestones

Below is everything you can win during the Date Night Thrills event:

Date Night Thrills Monopoly GO Rewards Summary

There are a total of 62 tiers of rewards in the Date Night Thrills event for you to clear. If fans beat the event, here's what they will get:

  • 17,455 Dice
  • 3,780 Heart Tokens
  • Grand Prize of 5,000 Free Dice and a Five-Star Sticker Pack
  • Two Five-Star Sticker Packs (52nd and 62nd Milestones)
  • One Four-Star Sticker Pack (38th Milestone)
  • A 10-Minute Color Wheel Boost at the 44th Milestone
  • A 40-Minute Mega Heist at the 50th Milestone
  • A 15-Minute Builder's Bash at the 18th Milestone.

Date Night Thrills Monopoly GO is only here for three days, so join the event now and try to complete as many milestones as you can before it ends.

How To Get Points In Date Night Thrills Monopoly GO

In the Date Night Thrills solo event, tycoons need to hit the Chance, Utility, and Tax spaces on their boards. Here's how many points they'll get:

  • Chance: Two Points
  • Utility: Two Points
  • Tax Tiles: Three Points.

If you want to speed things up, you should try to increase your multiplier when you're about seven spaces away from one of these tiles. The higher your multiplier, the more points you will earn.

item.title: Fortnite: How to Get Iron Man
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Get Iron Man in Fortnite

Marvel x Fortnite has brought forth yet another Iron Man skin, but despite a Mk 45 variant from Chapter 5 Season 4, an Avengers: Endgame -inspired Battle Pass skin from Chapter 2 Season 4, players can grab one more Iron Man skin for the collection for fans who just can't get enough of this Avenger in Fortnite .

The latest Iron Man skin in Fortnite is perhaps the greatest, as not only does it come with four distinct styles, but it also has 4 different colors to celebrate the character's armor throughout the years. This means that this Iron Man skin has 16 choices for players to select between to make their own Iron Man the very best.

How to Get Iron Man in Fortnite

2,000 V-Bucks

  • Iron Man Outfit

Iron Man can be purchased from the Item Shop for 2,000 V-Bucks, and while some might see that as a steep price for a singular skin and a LEGO variant, they need to remember that this Iron Man is pretty special, as he comes with four unique styles and four unique colors, so technically it's one skin with 16 different variations. Here are all the styles and colors available with the purchase of Iron Man:

Style

Color

Alpha

Red& Gold

Prime

Model 39

Ultimate

Model 42

Classic

Model Doom

A mixture of different celebrations of Iron Man, it's nice to see the character respected so highly with comic roots from the colors and the styles featured. For instance, the Prime style comes from the 2015 run of Iron Man , and the Classic style comes from Stan Lee and Larry Lieber's Tales of Suspense #48 all the way back in 1959.

Iron Man is available to purchase in the Item Shop until February 23, 8 PM ET.

Players can also grab the Iron Legion Bundle for 2,500 V-Bucks, which comes with Iron Man, as well as the Arc Counter Back Bling and Iron Sledge Pickaxe.

item.title: EA Sports FC 25: How to Get Free Maradona Card in Ultimate Team
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Get Free Maradona Grassroot Greats Card in EA FC 25
  • 89 OVR Maradona Grassroots Greats Icon Evo in EA FC 25, Explained
    • Maradona Diego's Dream I, II, III & Pibe de Oro Evolutions Stats

Following the release of Zinedine Zidane, EA Sports has officially announced the long-awaited return of Diego Armando Maradona to EA FC 25 , giving players the opportunity to claim his card for free in Ultimate Team. This special inclusion celebrates the launch of the Grassroot Greats event, which highlights footballers who rose from their hometown clubs to global stardom.

This time, players will have multiple Evolution paths to choose from, allowing them to progress Maradona’s journey from his early days with Argentinos Juniors at just 14 years old to becoming a world-class icon and serial winner with Napoli and the Argentine international team. If you’re looking to add the legendary Argentine to your UT squad, here’s a complete guide on how to unlock the free Maradona Grassroot Great Icon card in EA FC 25.

How to Get the Free Maradona Grassroot Greats Card in EA FC 25

To get the free Maradona Grassroots Greats Icon Card in Ultimate Team, players must play EA FC 25 between February 14, 2025, and March 14, 2025 , at 10 AM PT. This card will be untradeable , meaning it cannot be listed on the in-game Transfer Market for coins.

Maradona’s base free card features competitive stats; however, it’s through both free and paid Evolutions upgrades that you can truly elevate it, significantly enhancing all its attributes. The base version has a 77 OVR rating , is positioned as a Central Attacking Midfielder (CAM) , and has standout attributes, including:

  • 84 Pace
  • 80 Shooting
  • 74 Passing
  • 87 Dribbling
  • 34 Defending
  • 56 Physicality

Unlike Zidane, the base version of Diego Maradona’s card does not include any outstanding stats, as it represents his international debut at the age of 16 against Hungary in 1977. However, through Evolution paths, players can upgrade Maradona’s card to reflect his legendary European career with Napoli. The free 89 OVR upgrade allows players to unlock Maradona’s iconic 1989 UEFA Cup final version, commemorating when he captained Napoli to victory over Stuttgart in a hard-fought two-leg clash.

89 OVR Maradona Grassroots Greats Icon Evo in EA FC 25, Explained

After receiving the free 77 OVR Maradona base card, players can choose from three Evolution paths to upgrade it to an 89 OVR rating . Each path offers a unique combination of enhanced stats, PlayStyles, PlayStyle+ attributes, and Roles, allowing players to select the option that best fits their team’s needs.

Maradona Diego's Dream I, II, III & Pibe de Oro Evolutions Stats

Once complete, Diego's Dream I, II, III, and Pibe de Oro Evolutions will grant Maradona's card substantial stats and attributes upgrades . As for the Pibe de Oro, players can get a 92 OVR rating Maradona card, but this will require an investment to access the Evo.

Evolution Upgrade

Evolution Requirements

Stat, PlayStyles, Role & Position Improvements

Amount of Levels

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - Mice Quest Walkthrough
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - Mice Quest Walkthrough
  • How To Paint The Bull In Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2

After being ambushed by bandits, Henry and the other soldiers are stranded in the town of Troskowitz , stripped of their money and dressed in beggars’ clothes. With little to their name, players are encouraged to explore the game's vast open world, searching forests and abandoned camps for weapons, armor, and valuables to sell. This early stage of Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 provides a tough but immersive survival challenge, forcing players to scavenge for resources.

Throughout the Trosky Region, players can discover various side quests, one of which is the Mice quest in Tachov . Completing this quest is crucial, as it unlocks a follow-up quest that rewards players with the " Truce " Trophy/Achievement. Here's how to do it.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - Mice Quest Walkthrough

How To Start The Mice Quest

Make your way to Tachov and go to the Tavern . Here, you can find Innkeeper Prochek and ask him about the trouble he is having with the Zhelejovites. He will explain how the Zhelejovites have pranked the Tachov people over the last few years, and that he wants to prank them back. He will mention that Olbram, who owns a large plot of land in Zhelejov, has a white bull that Prochek wants you to paint. Painting the bull while it is awake would be quite challenging, so you need to craft a potion to knock it out , giving you ample time to paint. He will also advise you that, since this is all a prank, you should be careful and not get caught while you are in Zhelejov.

Make sure you do not inform the people of Zhelejov that they are being pranked, as this will fail the quest.

First, head over to Blacksmith Radovan and tell him that you need something to calm an animal down. If you have completed the first quest of his questline, " The Blacksmith's Son, " he will tell you the Recipe for Lullaby Potion .

Acquiring Paint For The Bull

To acquire Bull Paint , make your way to Tailor Bartoshek in Troskowitz and ask for some. He will mention having some left and will sell it to you for 60 Groschen . If you have enough money, simply pay him to speed up the process.

Alternatively, you can pass a Speech check to tell him that the paint is too expensive. This is an easy Speech check, and if successful, you will get the option to explain your reasons. Choose to tell the truth, and keep listening to him talk about paint. You will have to listen a few times before he gives you the paint for free . The tailor also sells clothing and can repair your worn clothes in exchange for Groschen.

With the paint in your possession, make your way to Apothecary Emmerich to craft the sleeping potion.

How To Paint The Bull In Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2

Crafting The Bull's Sleeping Potion

Apothecary Emmerich is located in the middle of Troskowitz. To make the Lullaby Potion , you will need Herb Paris , Thistle , and Poppy , all of which can be found relatively close by. You can buy Herb Paris from Emmerich, while Thistle and Poppy can be gathered from his yard. Poppy might be a little farther away on the other side of the fence, while Thistle is near the stone fences.

Once you have gathered all the ingredients, head to the Alchemy Bench and follow these steps to craft the Lullaby Potion:

  • Add all ingredients to the right of the cauldron for easy access.
  • Add Oil, then add the Poppy to the cauldron.
  • Boil for one hourglass duration, then raise the cauldron.
  • Add the Thistle to the cauldron and boil for one hourglass duration.
  • Grind the Herb Paris using a Pestle.
  • Add the Herb Paris to the Cauldron.
  • Pour the potion into a Phial.

You will need three Lullaby Potions to make the Bull fall asleep, since it is such a large beast. If your potion turns out to be a Weak Lullaby Potion , you may need to gather more ingredients and repeat the process to create a stronger version.

Painting The Bull In Mice Quest

With the potion and paint in hand, fast travel to Zhelejov. Head inside the barn to interact with the water trough, pouring the sleeping potion into it for the bull to drink. Wait until nighttime when the bull sleeps inside the barn, then sneak in. A Hired Hand might be sitting outside, so you can throw a rock to distract him before entering.

Once inside, interact with the bull to choose from multiple painting options. This choice does not affect the quest's outcome. When you are finished, return to Tachov and inform Prochek. He will reward you with 85 Groschen and start the next side quest, "Battle of the Frogs and Mice."
